name: Subject to Change (SoBad)
description:
It's the day of the big marathon, but that hasn't stopped some dastardly-deed-doers from committing a hideous crime. 

How can you possibly find them amongst all the joggers?

A short action-narrative experience. The main menu itself is a bit of a tutorial.  ;)

Tested With:
- Windows
- Mac
- Linux

Controls:
- Mouse only!
- ESC closes the game in a pinch

Additional Credits:
- Music by Josh Whelchel: soundofjw.bandcamp.com
- Art by LimeZu: https://limezu.itch.io/
- Some SFX by Filmcow: https://filmcow.itch.io/ 
- City Map designed by Dave: https://peterpoppintail.itch.io/ 

A special thanks to my many beta testers!

Made throughout January 2023 for the Monthly Game Project. Patreon supporters received a download key, Discord access, and lots of behind-the-scenes content!
